application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 Robinia Pseudoacacia  - Crown lift over footpath by 3meters. Height and spread Unchanged T2 Robinia Pseudoacacia - Crown reduction, reduce crown by up to 1.5 meters to shape and contain Final height 8 meters and final spread 4 meters. Crown lift over footpath and remove dead wood. T3 Robinia Pseudoacacia - Crown reduction, reduce crown by up to 1.5 meters to shape and contain Final height 8 meters and final spread 4 meters. Crown lift over footpath and remove dead wood. Remove Ivy. T4 Robinia Pseudoacacia - Crown reduction, reduce crown by up to 1.5 meters to shape and contain Final height 10 meters and final spread 4 meters. Crown lift over footpath and remove dead wood. T5 Robinia Pseudoacacia - Crown reduction, reduce crown by up to 1.5 meters to shape and contain Final height 8 meters and final spread 4 meters. Remove Ivy.The justification for the work is instead of just cutting back from the road and property, a crown reduction would balance the tree better. I'm happy to have a maximum cut size of 50mm.
